reference.title: What are the Benefits of Kaltura?
reference.shortdesc: This page details some of the capabilities of Kaltura's video assignment feature.

example.p: Kaltura is a media management system that can be used to upload video files as well as to create webcam recordings. Videos in Kaltura can be viewed on phones, tablets, and computers. Access Kaltura through your Canvas course site.
While Canvas Assignments offer an online submission type called Media Recordings, Kaltura's My Media offers greater flexibility with regard to ownership and use:

ul.li: There is no limit on Kaltura's file space whereas file space for each Canvas course is limited to 4.2GB.
If you use the Canvas Media Recordings option, any media (video/audio) will be uploaded directly to your Canvas course site. Because video files are so large, you could run out of space.
By using Kaltura, students can either record new media or upload existing media from their My Media space.
Media stored on Kaltura's file server can stream at various internet speeds.
